name: ANS | [GRC] - French support
testingInformation:
1. Ensure that the user interfaces offered to the customers are available at least in French.
2. The provider must provide first-level support at least in French.
3. Verify that the SoA is available at least in French.
actionPlanInstructions: Provide user interface, support and document in French.
actionPlanTitle: Requested support and document not available in French.

controlMappingSources.sourceName: Governance risk and compliance | Product Team
